ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We expelled them from gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We made them leave the gardens and springs of water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus did We drive them out of their gardens and springs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We are warning all of you about them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore got them out from the gardens and water springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, We expelled them from gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We turned them out of gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We expelled them from gardens and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus did We take them away from gardens and watersprings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We made them leave their gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We drave them forth from gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We took them out of gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We expelled them from gardens, springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, We expelled them from gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We expelled them from their gardens and their fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We drove them out of gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We removed them from gardens and springs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:57] God, exalted be He, says: So We made them, Pharaoh and his folk, go forth, out of Egypt, in order to pursue Moses and his people, from gardens, orchards on either side of the Nile, and springs, streams running from the Nile through their dwellings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus did We take them away from gardens and water springs) pure water,
